name: William and Sly
description:
The hit Flash series reborn


William and Sly is an open-world 3D platformer based on the popular Flash games from the golden age of browser gaming. Remember those familiar, cozy adventures, reimagined in an entirely new style.

An open world to explore


Race through lush valleys, soaring mountains, peaceful coasts, and other wild landscapes as a fox in search of mushrooms. Play at your own pace and untangle the magical machinations of a dark enchantress.

A wholesome adventure


The game features fifteen new songs and over ten hours of gameplay! Created in Unreal Engine with all assets, music, and gameplay by indie developer Lucas Paakh.
